name: 93_website
description: WebFlow website - work on custom code

scripts.build: rm -rf output/production .parcel-cache && NODE_ENV=production parcel build src/js/app.js --dist-dir output/production --no-source-maps
scripts.start: rm -rf output/development .parcel-cache && NODE_ENV=development parcel src/js/app.js --dist-dir output/development

author: Oleksii Sofiychuk
